input.sentences: sometimes the best weddings are informal expressions of love .
our friends attended | but in relaxed clothes | so everyone could enjoy themselves .
pretty comes from happiness and fun | a joyful face and favorite dress .
we shared food and drink to celebrate .
we all felt so close | like i was holding meaning in the palm of my hand .
output.sentences: I was abducted by aliens - and this is my story. It started one day while I at Claire's birthday party.
My friends were all watching, but noone saw it happen.
I was sitting between these two ladies, then suddenly, I disappeared!
As I levitated above the party, I saw my friends pouring drinks and having fun, not noticing what was going with me.
The only proof that I have that it happened at all are these marks on my hands. No one believes me and now my friends call me a conspiracy theorist.
